name: Mafia Contract
storyline: You have been shacked up in this sleazy hotel room for a week now. As a hit-man for Don Capolla, life hasn't been easy since the Gang War started. Last night, Capolla's son was assassinated and the acts of vengeance have already begun. Suddenly the phone rings ... they think it was you.
summary: A text adventure with illustrations. Play as a Mafia hit man who was framed for the death of the mob boss's son. How will, you clean your name, how will you survive? Only with cunning and wits!
